pullrequest.title: update TurtleBot3 models and add TurtleBot3 House

content.raw:
You're right. A turtlebot3_simulation pkg includes TB3 gazebo models(.sdf)
and it is same as i uploaded.
For now, user can use this to copy onto their gazebo model folder or
download .sdf using 'wget' command separetely.
But if this pull request is accepted, i would delete TB3 models(.sdf) in a
turtlebot3_simulation pkg.

Furthermore, older TB3 demos have been updating for synchronizing  every
TB3 model. We always keep in mind it when we develop code.

Because i didn't write down a model in CMakeLists, please inform to me when
you accept this request. Then, I will get new pull request including it.

Darby
content.html:
You're right. A turtlebot3_simulation pkg includes TB3 gazebo models(.sdf) and it is same as i uploaded. For now, user can use this to copy onto their gazebo model folder or download .sdf using 'wget' command separetely. But if this pull request is accepted, i would delete TB3 models(.sdf) in a turtlebot3_simulation pkg.

Furthermore, older TB3 demos have been updating for synchronizing every TB3 model. We always keep in mind it when we develop code.

Because i didn't write down a model in CMakeLists, please inform to me when you accept this request. Then, I will get new pull request including it.

Darby
